{ "tiddlers": { "$:/config/ShortcutInfo/DailyNotes": { "created": "20200509171443220", "text": "Calls the Daily Notes Tiddler", "tags": "", "title": "$:/config/ShortcutInfo/DailyNotes", "modified": "20200509171522039" }, "$:/config/shortcuts/DailyNotes": { "created": "20200509171534672", "text": "alt+q", "tags": "", "title": "$:/config/shortcuts/DailyNotes", "modified": "20200509171556646" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/KBshortcut": { "created": "20200509171745928", "text": "<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList"> <$action-navigate $to="Daily Notes"/> ", "tags": "$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/KBshortcut", "modified": "20200509172014641", "key": "((DailyNotes))" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/macros": { "created": "20200508141843034", "text": "\define DN_ifTiddlerNotExists(tiddler,body) \whitespace trim <$action-createtiddler $basetitle="$(tiddler)$" text="$(body)$" /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param="$(tiddler)$"/> \end \define DN_ifTiddlerExists(tiddler,body) \whitespace trim <$vars tiddler="$tiddler$" body="$body$"> <$list filter="[title] +[has[title]]" emptyMessage=<> > <$action-navigate $to=<> /> \end ", "bag": "default", "revision": "3", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/macros", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "modified": "20200509172126562" }, "Daily Notes": { "created": "20200509164956768", "text": "\define get-JournalTidderName() $(today)$ \define get-updatedText(TodaysTiddler,currentContent,timestamp,add) $(currentContent)$ <$button class=<> actions=<> tooltip="Expand Idea" >{{$:/core/images/clone-button}} ''$(timestamp)$'' $(add)$
\end \define get-origEntry(selectedEntry) $(selectedEntry)$
<$set name=today value=<> > <$set name=TodaysTiddler value=<> >

<> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Edit Today's notes">{{$:/core/images/edit-button}}<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param=<> />

<$set name=TodaysTiddler value=<> > <$keyboard key="enter"> <$edit-text class="dn-input input-large" tiddler="$:/temp/Append" field="newEntry" placeholder="Free your mind, dump it here..." focus="true"/> <$set name="timestamp" value=<> > <$set name=currentContent tiddler=<> > <$set name="add" value={{{ [{$:/temp/Append!!newEntry}trim[]] }}}> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<>/> <$action-deletefield $tiddler="$:/temp/Append" newEntry />

Today's entries

<$set name=currentContent tiddler=<> > <$list filter="[split[
]!is[blank]]" variable="selectedEntry"> <$set name="stateTiddler" filter="[addprefix[$:/temp/state/]]" emptyValue=error> <><$button class=<> tooltip="Delete Entry" set=<> setTo={{{ [splitjoin[]] }}} > {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} {{||$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags}} ", "bag": "default", "revision": "40", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "title": "Daily Notes", "tags": "", "modified": "20200509205335448" }, "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/stylesheet": { "created": "20200509183459884", "text": "input.dn-input.input-large { width: 100%; padding: .5em 1em; font-size: 1.1em; } .dn-label { display: block; text-align: right; font-size: .8em; opacity: .6; } input.dn-input:focus { border-color: rgb(255, 201, 102); }", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "title": "$:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes/stylesheet", "modified": "20200509183540729" } } }
title: $:/ak/plugins/DailyNotes
name: DailyNotes
